blackjack

Class Shoe

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.CollectionOfCards
      • blackjack.Shoe

  • public class Shoe
extends CollectionOfCards
    This class inherits CollectionOfCards and has a parameter shufflecount that stores the number of shuffles performed to the list of cards during the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pedro Esteves, Ricardo Cristino, Rui Br√°s

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int shufflecount
      The shufflecount.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shoe(int n_decks)
      Creates a shoe with a number of n_decks decks.
      Shoe(java.lang.String path)
      Receives as input the path of the txt file, containing the number and suit of all the cards to store in the shoe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Card dealCard()
      Returns the first card of the list of cards and removes it from the list, shifting all elements for the left.
      int getShufflecount()
      Returns shufflecount.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the list of cards with the method Collections.shuffle().

      • dealCard

        protected Card dealCard()
        Returns the first card of the list of cards and removes it from the list, shifting all elements for the left. If the list of cards is empty, the method returns null.
        Returns:
        the card
